data.text:
@RepJahanaHayes Mrs. Congresswoman, #Ukraine is not a NATO country, but does it mean that our lives are worth less? We just want to LIVE! if u cannot #CloseTheSkyUkraine 
at least please give us fighter jets, anti-rocket, and anti-aircraft defence to protect ourselves 🙏 https://t.co/QfdaHe5pAy

@RepJahanaHayes We are dying!In just 12 days, 600 !!! Russian missiles and bombs have been fired at Ukrainian cities, killing civilians every day.  we urge you to provide #SafeAirliftUkraine to stop #Putin’s bombing us. #ProtectUАSky #StopRussia https://t.co/XDqCzEh2v0
@RepJahanaHayes Thank you! Please 🙏🏼 , we call on you to provide #SafeAirliftUkraine to stop #Putin’s bombing of civilians in #Ukraine. 🇺🇦 #ProtectUАSky

@RepJahanaHayes In just 11 days, 600 !!! Russian missiles and bombs have been fired at Ukrainian cities, killing civilians every day.  we urge you to provide #SafeAirliftUkraine to stop #Putin’s bombing us. #ProtectUАSky https://t.co/WPFGHEelLm
@RepJahanaHayes Please stop Russian war against Ukraine. Ukrainians are defending the entire world from #Putin. We critically in need of #SafeAirliftUkraine https://t.co/JDHCN8dj96

@RepJahanaHayes In just 12 days, 600 !!! Russian missiles and bombs have been fired at Ukrainian cities, killing civilians every day.  we urge you to provide #SafeAirliftUkraine to stop #Putin’s bombing us. #ProtectUАSky https://t.co/YvoSPj4Quv

@RepJahanaHayes Ukraine, my country, is shelled by russia. Civilians are dying RIGHT NOW! #ClosetheSkyoverUkraine ! If you don't do it, provide us #SafeAirliftUkraine . We are people! Protecting people's life is the main duty of NATO!
#ClosetheSkyoverUkraine #StopPutinNOW https://t.co/5Em3M1UJVx
@RepJahanaHayes We appreciate it! Ukrainians are defending the entire world from #Putin. But we critically in need of #SafeAirliftUkraine

@RepJahanaHayes 12th day of war in Ukraine is happening. Please provide continued military aid and supply of armaments, #SafeAirliftUkraine, ban on export of Russian fossil fuels, targeted sanctions against Russian businessmen without carve-outs. Millions of Ukrainian civilian lives depend on it
